mapper.select: SELECT t.* ,t1.f_floor_name FROM t_base_areainfo t LEFT JOIN t_base_floorinfo t1 ON t.f_floor_id=t1.f_id
SELECT t.*, t1.f_floor_name AS floorName, t1.f_floor_code AS floorCode FROM t_base_areainfo t LEFT JOIN t_base_floorinfo t1 ON t.f_floor_id = t1.f_id WHERE t.f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
